dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT OD_FQA_ID , OD_PB_DIVISION , OD_SC_REGION , OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME , OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL , OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME , OD_SC_FACTORY_NAME , OD_PB_PROJ_NUM , OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT , OD_PB_APPROVAL_STATUS , OD_FQA_CAP_ID , OD_PB_AUDIT_TYPE , OD_PB_AUDIT_DATE , OD_OB_FQA_GENERAL , OD_PB_DESIGN_CONTROL_SCORE , OD_PB_PURCHASE_CONTROL_SCORE , OD_PB_STORAGE_MANAGEMENT_SCORE , OD_PB_INCOMING_INSPECT_SCORE , OD_PB_PRODUCTION_CONTROL_SCORE , OD_PB_CONTINUOUS_IMPROVE_SCORE , OD_PB_FQA_SCORE , OD_OB_AUDIT_GRADE , OD_PB_FQA_REAUDIT_TYPE , OD_PB_FQA_REAUDIT_D FROM q_od_ob_fqa_v qfqav where TRUNC(qfqav.creation_date) BETWEEN NVL(To_Date(:P_DATE_FROM,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'),TRUNC(qfqav.creation_date)) AND NVL( To_Date(:P_DATE_TO,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'),TRUNC(qfqav.creation_date)) AND NVL(od_pb_proj_num,'X')=NVL( :P_PROJECT_NUMBER,NVL(od_pb_proj_num,'X')) AND NVL(od_sc_region,'X')=NVL( :P_REGION,NVL(od_sc_region,'X')) AND NVL(od_sc_audit_agent, 'X') = NVL ( :P_SOURCE_AGENT, NVL (od_sc_audit_agent, 'X')) AND NVL(od_pb_division,'X')=NVL( :P_DIVISION,NVL(od_pb_division,'X')) AND NVL (od_ob_vendor_name, 'X') = NVL ( :P_VENDOR_NAME, NVL (od_ob_vendor_name, 'X')) AND NVL (od_sc_factory_name, 'X') = NVL ( :P_FACTORY_NAME, NVL (od_sc_factory_name, 'X')) AND NVL (od_pb_approval_status, 'X') = NVL ( :P_APPROVAL_STATUS, NVL (od_pb_approval_status, 'X')) and NVL (OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME, 'X') = NVL (:P_SUBMITTER, NVL (OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME, 'X')) and NVL (OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL, 'X') = NVL (:P_APPROVER, NVL (OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL, 'X'))

SELECT QOOFV.OD_OB_FAI_ID , QOOFV.OD_SC_REGION , QOOFSV.OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME , QOOFV.OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME , QOOFV.OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL , QOOFV.OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME , QOOFV.OD_OB_FACTORY_NAME , QOOFV.OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT , QOOFV.OD_PB_PROJ_NUM , QOOFSV.OD_OB_SKU , QOOFSV.OD_PB_ITEM_DESC , QOOFSV.OD_PB_VENDOR_VPC , QOOFV.OD_PB_APPROVAL_STATUS , QOOFV.OD_OB_REF_CAPID , QOOFV.OD_SC_INSPECTION_DATE , QOOFV.OD_OB_AUDIT_RESULT , QOOFV.OD_OB_GENERAL_RESULT , QOOFV.OD_OB_PROCESS_INSP_RESULT , QOOFV.OD_OB_PROD_INSP_RESULT , QOOFV.OD_OB_PKG_INSP_RESULT , QOOFV.OD_OB_TESTING_INSP_RESULT , QOOFV.OD_OB_INSP_PROTOCOL_RESULT FROM Q_OD_OB_FAI_V QOOFV , Q_OD_OB_FAI_SKU_V QOOFSV WHERE QOOFV.OD_OB_FAI_ID = QOOFSV.OD_OB_REF_REC_ID(+) AND TRUNC(QOOFV.creation_date) BETWEEN NVL(To_Date(:P_DATE_FROM,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'),TRUNC(QOOFV.creation_date)) AND NVL( To_Date(:P_DATE_TO,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'),TRUNC(QOOFV.creation_date)) AND NVL(QOOFV.OD_PB_PROJ_NUM,'X') = NVL(:P_PROJECT_NUMBER, NVL(QOOFV.OD_PB_PROJ_NUM,'X') ) AND NVL(QOOFV.od_sc_region,'X')=NVL(:P_REGION,NVL(QOOFV.od_sc_region,'X')) AND NVL(QOOFV.OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT,'X') = NVL(:P_SOURCE_AGENT, NVL(QOOFV.OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT,'X') ) AND NVL(QOOFSV.OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME,'X') = NVL(:P_DEPARTMENT, NVL(QOOFSV.OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME,'X') ) AND NVL(QOOFV.OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME,'X') = NVL(:P_VENDOR_NAME, NVL(QOOFV.OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME,'X') ) AND NVL(QOOFV.OD_OB_FACTORY_NAME,'X') = NVL(:P_FACTORY_NAME, NVL(QOOFV.OD_OB_FACTORY_NAME,'X') ) AND NVL(QOOFSV.OD_OB_SKU,1) = NVL(:P_SKU, NVL(QOOFSV.OD_OB_SKU,1) ) AND NVL(QOOFSV.OD_PB_VENDOR_VPC,'X') = NVL(:P_VPN, NVL(QOOFSV.OD_PB_VENDOR_VPC,'X') ) AND NVL(QOOFV.OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL,'X') = NVL(:P_APPROVER, NVL(QOOFV.OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL,'X') ) AND NVL(QOOFV.OD_PB_APPROVAL_STATUS,'X') = NVL(:P_APPROVAL_STATUS, NVL(QOOFV.OD_PB_APPROVAL_STATUS,'X') ) AND NVL(QOOFV.OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME,'X') = NVL(:P_SUBMITTER, NVL(QOOFV.OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME,'X') ) ORDER BY QOOFV.OD_OB_FAI_ID ,QOOFSV.OD_PB_PROJ_NUM

SELECT QOV.OD_OB_PS_ID ,QOSV.OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME ,QOV.OD_SC_REGION ,QOV.OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME ,QOV.OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL ,Qov.OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME ,QOV.OD_OB_FACTORY_NAME ,QOV.OD_PB_PROJ_NUM ,QOV.OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT ,QOSV.OD_PB_PROJ_NUM ,QOSV.OD_PB_VENDOR_VPC ,QOSV.OD_OB_SKU ,QOSV.OD_PB_ITEM_DESC ,QOV.OD_PB_DATE_REQUESTED ,QOV.OD_PB_APPROVAL_STATUS ,QOV.OD_PB_DATE_REPORTED FROM Q_OD_OB_PS_V QOV ,Q_OD_OB_PS_SKU_V QOSV WHERE QOV.OD_OB_PS_ID = QOSV.OD_OB_REF_PS_ID(+) AND TRUNC(QOV.creation_date) BETWEEN NVL(To_Date(:P_DATE_FROM,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'),TRUNC(qov.creation_date)) AND NVL( To_Date(:P_DATE_TO,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'),TRUNC(qov.creation_date)) AND NVL(QOV.OD_PB_PROJ_NUM,'X') = NVL(:P_PROJECT_NUMBER,NVL(QOV.OD_PB_PROJ_NUM,'X')) AND NVL(QOV.od_sc_region,'X')=NVL(:P_REGION,NVL(QOV.od_sc_region,'X')) AND NVL(QOV.OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT,'X')=NVL(:P_SOURCE_AGENT,NVL(QOV.OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT,'X')) AND NVL(QOSV.OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME,'X')= NVL(:P_DEPARTMENT,NVL(QOSV.OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME,'X')) AND NVL(QOV.OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME,'X')= Nvl(:P_VENDOR_NAME,Nvl(Qov.Od_Ob_Vendor_Name,'X')) And Nvl(Qov.Od_ob_Factory_Name,'X')= NVL(:P_FACTORY_NAME,NVL(QOV.OD_OB_FACTORY_NAME,'X')) AND NVL(QOSV.OD_OB_SKU,1) = NVL(:P_SKU,NVL(QOSV.OD_OB_SKU,1)) AND NVL(QOSV.OD_PB_VENDOR_VPC,'X') = NVL(:P_VPN, NVL(QOSV.OD_PB_VENDOR_VPC,'X') ) AND NVL(QOV.OD_PB_APPROVAL_STATUS,'X')= Nvl(:P_APPROVAL_STATUS,Nvl(Qov.Od_Pb_Approval_Status,'X')) AND NVL(QOV.OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME,'X')= NVL(:P_SUBMITTER,NVL(QOV.OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME,'X')) AND NVL(QOV.OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL,'X')= NVL(:P_APPROVER,NVL(QOV.OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL,'X'))

SELECT qopv.od_ob_ppt_id , qopsv.od_pb_sc_dept_name , qopv.od_sc_region , qopv.od_pb_auditor_name , qopv.od_pb_qa_engr_email , qopv.od_ob_vendor_name , qopv.od_ob_factory_name , qopv.od_pb_proj_num , qopv.od_sc_audit_agent , qopsv.od_ob_sku , qopsv.od_pb_item_desc , qopsv.od_pb_vendor_vpc , qotsv.OD_OB_PROD_INSP_RESULT , qotsv.OD_PB_DATE_DUE , qotsv.OD_PB_EVALUATION_DATE , qotsv.OD_PB_DATE_KICKOFF , qotsv.OD_PB_DATE_VERIFIED , qotsv.OD_PB_DATE_SAMPLE_SENT , qotsv.OD_PB_DATE_SAMPLE_RECEIVED , qopv.OD_PB_DATE_VERIFIED VERIFIED , qopsv.OD_OB_SKU_STATUS , qopsv.OD_OB_SKU_GRP , qotsv.OD_OB_TEST_TYPE , qotsv.OD_OB_TEST_STATUS , qotsv.OD_PB_VERIFICATION_COMMENTS , qopv.OD_PB_COMPANY , qopv.OD_OB_LAB_LOCATION , qotsv.OD_PB_PROTOCOL_NUMBER , qotsv.OD_PB_REPORT_NUMBER FROM apps.q_od_ob_ppt_test_status_v qotsv , apps.q_od_ob_ppt_sku_v qopsv , apps.q_od_ob_ppt_v qopv WHERE qopsv.od_ob_ref_pptid = qopv.od_ob_ppt_id AND qotsv.od_ob_ref_pptid = qopv.od_ob_ppt_id AND qotsv.OD_OB_PPTSKU_REFID = qopsv.OD_OB_PPTSKU_ID AND TRUNC(qopv.creation_date) BETWEEN NVL(To_Date(:P_DATE_FROM,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'),TRUNC(qopv.creation_date)) AND NVL( To_Date(:P_DATE_TO,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'),TRUNC(qopv.creation_date)) AND NVL(qopv.od_pb_proj_num,'-1') = NVL(:P_PROJECT_NUMBER,NVL(qopv.od_pb_proj_num,'-1')) AND NVL(qopv.od_sc_region,'X') = NVL(:P_REGION,NVL(qopv.od_sc_region,'X')) AND NVL(qopv.od_sc_audit_agent,'X') = NVL(:P_SOURCE_AGENT,NVL(qopv.od_sc_audit_agent,'X')) AND NVL(qopsv.od_pb_sc_dept_name,'X') = NVL(:P_DEPARTMENT,NVL(qopsv.od_pb_sc_dept_name,'X')) AND NVL(qopv.od_ob_vendor_name,'X') = NVL(:P_VENDOR_NAME,NVL(qopv.od_ob_vendor_name,'X')) AND NVL(qopv.od_ob_factory_name,'X') = NVL(:P_FACTORY_NAME,NVL(qopv.od_ob_factory_name,'X')) AND NVL(qopsv.od_ob_sku,1) = NVL(:P_SKU,NVL(qopsv.od_ob_sku,1)) AND NVL(qopsv.od_pb_vendor_vpc,'X') = NVL(:P_VPN,NVL(qopsv.od_pb_vendor_vpc,'X')) AND NVL(qopv.od_pb_auditor_name,'X') = NVL(:P_SUBMITTER,NVL(qopv.od_pb_auditor_name,'X')) AND NVL(qopv.od_pb_qa_engr_email,'X') = NVL(:P_APPROVER,NVL(qopv.od_pb_qa_engr_email,'X')) ORDER BY qopv.creation_date

SELECT QOOCCV.OD_PB_CUSTOMER_COMPLAINT_ID , QOOCCV.OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME , QOOCCV.OD_SC_REGION , QOOCCV.OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME , QOOCCV.OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL , QOOCCV.OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME , QOOCCV.OD_OB_FACTORY_NAME , QOOCCV.OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT , QOOCCV.OD_OB_SKU , QOOCCV.OD_PB_ITEM_DESC , QOOCCV.OD_OB_REF_CAPID , QOOCCV.OD_PB_DATE_OPENED , QOOCCV.OD_PB_DATE_CLOSED , QOOCCV.OD_PB_DATE_SAMPLE_SENT , QOOCCV.OD_PB_DATE_SAMPLE_RECEIVED , QOOCCV.OD_PB_DEFECT_SUM , QOOCCV.OD_PB_DEFECT_CODE , QOOCCV.OD_PB_ROOT_CAUSE_TYPE FROM Q_OD_OB_CUSTOMER_COMPLAINTS_V QOOCCV WHERE TRUNC(QOOCCV.creation_date) BETWEEN NVL(To_Date(:P_DATE_FROM,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'),TRUNC(QOOCCV.creation_date)) AND NVL( To_Date(:P_DATE_TO,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'),TRUNC(QOOCCV.creation_date)) AND NVL(QOOCCV.OD_SC_REGION , 'X') = NVL(:P_REGION , NVL(QOOCCV.OD_SC_REGION , 'X') ) AND NVL(QOOCCV.OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT , 'X') = NVL(:P_SOURCE_AGENT , NVL(QOOCCV.OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT , 'X') ) AND NVL(QOOCCV.OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME , 'X') = NVL(:P_DEPARTMENT , NVL(QOOCCV.OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME , 'X') ) AND NVL(QOOCCV.OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME , 'X') = NVL(:P_VENDOR_NAME , NVL(QOOCCV.OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME , 'X') ) AND NVL(QOOCCV.OD_OB_FACTORY_NAME , 'X') = NVL(:P_FACTORY_NAME , NVL(QOOCCV.OD_OB_FACTORY_NAME , 'X') ) AND NVL(QOOCCV.OD_OB_SKU , 1) = NVL(:P_SKU , NVL(QOOCCV.OD_OB_SKU , 1) ) AND NVL(QOOCCV.OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME , 'X') = NVL(:P_SUBMITTER , NVL(QOOCCV.OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME , 'X') ) and NVL(QOOCCV.OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL , 'X') = NVL(:P_APPROVER , NVL(QOOCCV.OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL , 'X') ) ORDER BY OD_PB_CUSTOMER_COMPLAINT_ID

SELECT OD_OB_SPC_ID, OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME, OD_SC_REGION, OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME, OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL, OD_OB_REF_CAPID, OD_PB_DATE_OPENED, OD_PB_DATE_CORR_IMPL, OD_PB_COMPANY, OD_PB_SERVICE_LOCATION, OD_PB_TECH_RPT_NUM, OD_PB_DEFECT_SUM, OD_PB_DEFECT_CODE FROM q_od_ob_spc_v WHERE TRUNC(creation_date) BETWEEN NVL(To_Date(:P_DATE_FROM,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'),TRUNC(creation_date)) AND NVL( To_Date(:P_DATE_TO,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'),TRUNC(creation_date)) AND NVL(od_sc_region,'X')=NVL(:P_REGION,NVL(od_sc_region,'X')) AND NVL(od_pb_company,'X') = NVL (:P_SERVICE_PROVIDER, NVL(od_pb_company,'X')) AND NVL(od_pb_sc_dept_name,'X') = NVL (:P_DEPARTMENT, NVL(od_pb_sc_dept_name,'X')) And NVL(Od_Pb_Auditor_Name,'X') = Nvl (:P_SUBMITTER, NVL(Od_Pb_Auditor_Name,'X')) AND NVL(od_pb_qa_engr_email,'X') = NVL (:P_APPROVER, NVL(od_pb_qa_engr_email,'X')) and NVL(OD_PB_DIVISION,'X') = NVL (:P_DIVISION, NVL(OD_PB_DIVISION,'X')) order by OD_OB_SPC_ID

SELECT OD_OB_SPA_ID, OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME, OD_SC_REGION, OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME, OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL, OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME, OD_OB_FACTORY_NAME, OD_PB_PROJ_NUM, OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT, OD_OB_SKU, OD_PB_ITEM_DESC, OD_PB_VENDOR_VPC, OD_OB_SPA_STATUS, OD_OB_REF_CAPID, OD_PB_FQA_REQUESTER, OD_PB_COMPANY, OD_PB_SERVICE_LOCATION, OD_PB_TECH_RPT_NUM, OD_PB_CASE_NUMBER, OD_PB_AUDIT_TYPE, OD_PB_PO_NUM, OD_SC_COMPLETE_BY_START_DATE, OD_SC_COMPLETE_BY_END_DATE, OD_PB_DATE_CORR_IMPL FROM Q_OD_OB_SPA_V qospav WHERE TRUNC(creation_date) BETWEEN NVL(To_Date(:P_DATE_FROM,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'),TRUNC(creation_date)) AND NVL( To_Date(:P_DATE_TO,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'),TRUNC(creation_date)) AND NVL(od_pb_proj_num,'X')=NVL(:P_PROJECT_NUMBER,NVL(od_pb_proj_num,'X')) AND NVL(OD_SC_REGION,'X') = NVL(:P_REGION, NVL(OD_SC_REGION,'X')) AND NVL(OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME,'X') = NVL(:P_VENDOR_NAME, NVL(OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME,'X')) AND NVL(OD_OB_FACTORY_NAME,'X') = NVL(:P_FACTORY_NAME, NVL(OD_OB_FACTORY_NAME,'X')) AND NVL(OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME,'X') = NVL(:P_DEPARTMENT, NVL(OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME,'X')) AND NVL(OD_PB_DIVISION,'X') = NVL(:P_DIVISION, NVL(OD_PB_DIVISION,'X')) AND NVL(OD_OB_SKU,1) = NVL(:P_SKU,NVL(OD_OB_SKU,1)) AND NVL(OD_PB_VENDOR_VPC,'X') = NVL(:P_VPN,NVL(OD_PB_VENDOR_VPC,'X')) AND NVL(OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME,'X') = NVL(:P_SUBMITTER,NVL(OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME,'X')) AND NVL(OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL,'X') = NVL(:P_APPROVER, NVL(OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL,'X')) and NVL(OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT, 'X') = NVL (:P_SOURCE_AGENT, NVL (OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT, 'X')) order by OD_OB_SPA_ID

SELECT od_ob_sa_id , od_pb_sc_dept_name , od_sc_region , od_sc_audit_agent , od_pb_auditor_name , od_pb_qa_engr_email , od_ob_vendor_name , od_ob_factory_name , od_ob_sku , od_pb_item_desc , od_ob_sample_status , od_pb_date_sample_sent , od_ob_sample_stage FROM q_od_ob_sample_approval_v WHERE TRUNC(creation_date) BETWEEN NVL(To_Date(:P_DATE_FROM,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'),TRUNC(creation_date)) AND NVL( To_Date(:P_DATE_TO,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'),TRUNC(creation_date)) AND NVL(OD_SC_REGION,'X') = NVL(:P_REGION, NVL(OD_SC_REGION,'X')) AND NVL(od_sc_audit_agent, 'X') = NVL (:P_SOURCE_AGENT, NVL (od_sc_audit_agent, 'X')) AND NVL(OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME,'X') = NVL(:P_VENDOR_NAME, NVL(OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME,'X')) AND NVL(OD_OB_FACTORY_NAME,'X') = NVL(:P_FACTORY_NAME, NVL(OD_OB_FACTORY_NAME,'X')) AND NVL(OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME,'X') = NVL(:P_DEPARTMENT, NVL(OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME,'X')) AND NVL(OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME,'X') = NVL(:P_SUBMITTER,NVL(OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME,'X')) AND NVL(OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL,'X') = NVL(:P_APPROVER, NVL(OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL,'X')) and NVL(OD_OB_SKU,1) = NVL(:P_SKU,NVL(OD_OB_SKU,1))

SELECT ecr.OD_PB_ECR_ID , esk.OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME , ecr.OD_SC_REGION , ecr.OD_PB_QA_ENGINEER , ecr.OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL , ecr.OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME , ecr.OD_SC_FACTORY_NAME , esk.OD_OB_SKU , esk.OD_PB_ITEM_DESC , ecr.OD_PB_APPROVAL_STATUS , ecr.OD_PB_DATE_REQUESTED , ecr.OD_PB_DATE_PROPOSED_PRODUCTION , ecr.OD_PB_CHANGE_DESC , ecr.OD_PB_CHG_CAT_AESTHETICS , ecr.OD_PB_CHG_CAT_DESIGN , ecr.OD_PB_CHG_CAT_LOCATION , ecr.OD_PB_CHG_CAT_PACKAGING , ecr.OD_PB_CHG_CAT_PERFORMANCE , ecr.OD_PB_CHG_CAT_SAFETY , ecr.OD_PB_CHG_CAT_SOFTWARE , ecr.OD_PB_CHG_CAT_SUBSTITUTION , ecr.OD_PB_TECH_RPT_NUM FROM apps.q_od_ob_ecr_sku_v esk ,apps.q_od_ob_ecr_v ecr WHERE TRUNC(ecr.creation_date) BETWEEN NVL(To_Date(:P_DATE_FROM,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'),TRUNC(ECR.creation_date)) AND NVL( To_Date(:P_DATE_TO,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'),TRUNC(ECR.creation_date)) AND esk.OD_OB_REF_ECR(+)=ecr.od_pb_ecr_id AND NVL(ecr.OD_SC_REGION,'X') = NVL(:P_REGION, NVL(ecr.OD_SC_REGION,'X')) AND NVL(esk.OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME,'X')=NVL(:P_DEPARTMENT,NVL(esk.OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME,'X')) AND NVL(ecr.OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME,'X')=NVL(:P_VENDOR_NAME,NVL(ecr.OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME,'X')) AND NVL(ecr.OD_SC_FACTORY_NAME,'X')=NVL(:P_FACTORY_NAME,NVL(ecr.OD_SC_FACTORY_NAME,'X')) AND NVL(esk.OD_OB_SKU,1)=NVL(:P_SKU,NVL(esk.OD_OB_SKU,1)) and NVL (OD_PB_QA_ENGINEER, 'X') = NVL (:P_SUBMITTER, NVL (OD_PB_QA_ENGINEER, 'X')) and NVL (OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL, 'X') = NVL (:P_APPROVER, NVL (OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL, 'X')) ORDER BY ECR.OD_PB_ECR_ID,ESK.OD_OB_SKU,ECR.OD_PB_DATE_REQUESTED desc

SELECT cap.OD_PB_CAR_ID , cap.OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME , cap.od_sc_region , cap.OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME , cap.OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL , DECODE(cap.OD_OB_QA_ACT,'SPC',cap.OD_PB_COMPANY,cap.od_ob_vendor_name) VENDOR_NAME , DECODE(cap.OD_OB_QA_ACT,'SPC',cap.OD_PB_SERVICE_LOCATION,cap.od_sc_factory_name) FACTORY_NAME , cap.OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT , cap.OD_OB_SKU , cap.OD_PB_ITEM_DESC , cap.OD_PB_VENDOR_VPC , cap.OD_PB_APPROVAL_STATUS , cap.OD_OB_QA_ID , cap.OD_PB_DATE_CAPA_SENT , cap.OD_PB_DATE_CAPA_RECEIVED , cap.OD_PB_DATE_APPROVED , cap.OD_PB_TECH_RPT_NUM , cpd.OD_OB_DS_ID --, substr(cpd.OD_PB_DEFECT_SUM,1,10) OD_PB_DEFECT_SUM ,cpd.OD_PB_DEFECT_SUM , cpd.OD_PB_ROOT_CAUSE , cpd.OD_PB_CORR_ACTION , cpd.OD_PB_PREVENTIVE_ACTION , cpd.OD_PB_DATE_CORR_IMPL , cpd.OD_PB_APPROVAL_STATUS APP_STATUS , cpd.OD_PB_DATE_APPROVED DATE_APP , cpd.OD_OB_VN_ID , cpd.OD_PB_DATE_VERIFIED , cpd.OD_OB_VERIFICATION_METHOD FROM q_od_ob_cap_defects_v cpd , q_od_ob_cap_v cap WHERE TRUNC(cap.creation_date) BETWEEN NVL(To_Date(:P_DATE_FROM,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'),TRUNC(cap.creation_date)) AND NVL( To_Date(:P_DATE_TO,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'),TRUNC(cap.creation_date)) AND cpd.od_ob_ref_capid = cap.od_pb_car_id AND NVL(cap.OD_SC_REGION,'X') = NVL(:P_REGION, NVL(cap.OD_SC_REGION,'X')) AND NVL(cap.OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT , 'X') = NVL(:P_SOURCE_AGENT , NVL(cap.OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT , 'X')) AND NVL(cap.OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME , 'X') = NVL(:P_DEPARTMENT , NVL(cap.OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME , 'X')) AND NVL(cap.OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME , 'X') = NVL(:P_VENDOR_NAME , NVL(cap.OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME , 'X')) AND NVL(cap.OD_SC_FACTORY_NAME , 'X') = NVL(:P_FACTORY_NAME , NVL(cap.OD_SC_FACTORY_NAME , 'X')) AND NVL(cap.OD_OB_SKU , 1) = NVL(:P_SKU , NVL(cap.OD_OB_SKU , 1)) AND NVL(cap.OD_PB_VENDOR_VPC,'X') = NVL(:P_VPN,NVL(cap.OD_PB_VENDOR_VPC,'X')) AND NVL(cap.OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME , 'X') = NVL(:P_SUBMITTER , NVL(cap.OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME , 'X')) AND NVL(cap.OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL , 'X') = NVL(:P_APPROVER , NVL(cap.OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL , 'X')) AND NVL(cap.OD_PB_APPROVAL_STATUS , 'X') = NVL(:P_APPROVAL_STATUS , NVL(cap.OD_PB_APPROVAL_STATUS , 'X')) ORDER BY cap.OD_PB_CAR_ID , cpd.OD_OB_DS_ID

SELECT OD_OB_VNID ,OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME ,OD_SC_REGION ,OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME ,OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL ,OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME ,OD_OB_FACTORY_NAME ,OD_PB_SOURCING_AGENT ,OD_OB_SKU ,OD_PB_ITEM_DESC ,OD_OB_VPN ,OD_PB_APPROVAL_STATUS ,OD_OB_VN_CAP_ID ,OD_OB_ACTIVITY_ID ,OD_OB_VN_DATE ,OD_PB_DATE_APPROVED ,OD_OB_VN_DS_ID ,OD_SC_VENDOR_STATUS ,OD_PB_REPORT_NUMBER ,OD_PB_VERIFICATION_REQUIRED ,OD_PB_DATE_VERIFIED ,OD_PB_DEFECT_SUM ,OD_OB_REASON FROM q_od_ob_vn_v WHERE TRUNC(creation_date) BETWEEN NVL(To_Date(:P_DATE_FROM,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'),TRUNC(creation_date)) AND NVL( To_Date(:P_DATE_TO,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'),TRUNC(creation_date)) AND NVL(OD_SC_REGION,'X') = NVL(:P_REGION,NVL(OD_SC_REGION,'X')) AND NVL(OD_PB_SOURCING_AGENT,'X') = NVL(:P_SOURCE_AGENT,NVL(OD_PB_SOURCING_AGENT,'X')) AND NVL(OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME,'X') = NVL(:P_DEPARTMENT,NVL(OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME,'X')) AND NVL(OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME,'X') = NVL(:P_VENDOR_NAME,NVL(OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME,'X')) AND NVL(OD_OB_FACTORY_NAME,'X') = NVL(:P_FACTORY_NAME,NVL(OD_OB_FACTORY_NAME,'X')) AND NVL(OD_OB_SKU,'1') = NVL(:P_SKU,NVL(OD_OB_SKU,'1')) AND NVL(OD_OB_VPN,'X') = NVL(:P_VPN,NVL(OD_OB_VPN,'X')) AND NVL(OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME,'X') = NVL(:P_SUBMITTER,NVL(OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME,'X')) AND NVL(OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL,'X') = NVL(:P_APPROVER,NVL(OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL,'X')) ORDER BY 1

SELECT OD_OB_RGA_ID ,OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME ,OD_SC_REGION ,OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME ,OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL ,OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME ,OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT ,OD_OB_SKU ,OD_PB_ITEM_DESC ,OD_PB_APPROVAL_STATUS ,OD_OB_REF_CAPID ,OD_SC_SCHEDULED_DATE ,OD_OB_PICKUP_LOCATION ,OD_PB_VENDOR_COMMENTS ,OD_PB_REASON_CODE ,OD_OB_DISPUTE_YN ,OD_PB_DEFECT_CODE ,OD_PB_ENGINEER_FINDINGS ,OD_PB_SAMPLE_DISPOSITION FROM Q_OD_OB_RGA_V WHERE TRUNC(creation_date) BETWEEN NVL(To_Date(:P_DATE_FROM,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'),TRUNC(creation_date)) AND NVL( To_Date(:P_DATE_TO,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'),TRUNC(creation_date)) AND NVL(OD_SC_REGION,'X') = NVL(:P_REGION,NVL(OD_SC_REGION,'X')) AND NVL(OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT,'X') = NVL(:P_SOURCE_AGENT,NVL(OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT,'X')) AND NVL(OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME,'X') = NVL(:P_DEPARTMENT,NVL(OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME,'X')) AND NVL(OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME,'X') = NVL(:P_VENDOR_NAME,NVL(OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME,'X')) AND NVL(OD_OB_SKU,1) = NVL(:P_SKU,NVL(OD_OB_SKU,1)) AND NVL(OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME,'X') = NVL(:P_SUBMITTER,NVL(OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME,'X')) AND NVL(OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL,'X') = NVL(:P_APPROVER,NVL(OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL,'X')) ORDER BY od_ob_rga_id, od_ob_sku

SELECT a.od_ob_withdrawal_id , a.od_sc_region , a.od_pb_auditor_name , a.od_pb_qa_engr_email , a.od_ob_vendor_name , a.od_ob_factory_name , a.od_sc_audit_agent , a.od_ob_withdrawal_status , b.od_ob_sku , b.od_pb_item_desc , a.od_ob_withdrawal_type , a.od_pb_defect_sum , a.od_pb_entity , a.od_pb_cost_associated , a.od_sc_pay_amount , a.od_sc_num_workers FROM q_od_ob_wd_sku_v b, q_od_ob_withdrawal_v a WHERE TRUNC(a.creation_date) BETWEEN NVL(To_Date(:P_DATE_FROM,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'),TRUNC(a.creation_date)) AND NVL( To_Date(:P_DATE_TO,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'),TRUNC(a.creation_date)) AND b.od_ob_ref_wd_id=a.od_ob_withdrawal_id AND NVL(a.OD_SC_REGION,'X') = NVL(:P_REGION,NVL(a.OD_SC_REGION,'X')) AND NVL(a.OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT,'X') = NVL(:P_SOURCE_AGENT,NVL(a.OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT,'X')) AND NVL(a.OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME,'X') = NVL(:P_VENDOR_NAME,NVL(a.OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME,'X')) AND NVL(b.OD_OB_SKU,1) = NVL(:P_SKU,NVL(b.OD_OB_SKU,1)) AND NVL(a.OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME,'X') = NVL(:P_SUBMITTER,NVL(a.OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME,'X')) AND NVL(a.OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL,'X') = NVL(:P_APPROVER,NVL(a.OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL,'X')) ORDER BY a.creation_date,b.od_ob_sku

select qfd.od_ob_fd_id ,qfd.od_sc_region ,qfd.od_pb_auditor_name ,qfd.od_pb_qa_engr_email ,qfd.od_ob_vendor_name ,qfd.od_ob_factory_name ,qfd.od_sc_audit_agent ,qfd.od_ob_fd_date ,qfd.od_ob_primary_products ,qfd.od_ob_iqc_pass_pct ,qfd.od_ob_iqc_sample_sz ,qfd.od_ob_iqc_defects ,qfd.od_ob_qc_pass_pct ,qfd.od_ob_qc_sample_sz ,qfd.od_ob_qc_defects ,qfd.od_ob_fgi_pass_pct ,qfd.od_ob_fgi_qty ,qfd.od_ob_fqc_sample_sz ,qfd.od_ob_fqc_defects ,qfd.od_ob_qa_scope ,qfd.od_ob_fd_frequency ,qfdd.od_ob_inspection_type ,qfdd.od_pb_defect_sum ,qfdd.od_pb_defect_code ,qfdd.od_ob_defect_pct from q_od_ob_factory_data_v qfd, q_od_ob_fact_data_defects_v qfdd WHERE TRUNC(qfd.creation_date) BETWEEN NVL(To_Date(:P_DATE_FROM,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'),TRUNC(qfd.creation_date)) AND NVL( To_Date(:P_DATE_TO,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'),TRUNC(qfd.creation_date)) AND qfd.od_ob_fd_id = qfdd.od_ob_ref_fdid(+) and NVL(qfd.od_sc_region,'X') = nvl (:P_REGION,NVL(qfd.od_sc_region,'X')) and NVL(qfd.od_sc_audit_agent,'X') = nvl (:P_SOURCE_AGENT, NVL(qfd.od_sc_audit_agent,'X')) and NVL(qfd.od_ob_vendor_name,'X') = nvl (:P_VENDOR_NAME, NVL(qfd.od_ob_vendor_name,'X')) and NVL(qfd.od_ob_factory_name,'X') = nvl (:P_FACTORY_NAME, NVL(qfd.od_ob_factory_name,'X')) and NVL(qfd.od_pb_auditor_name,'X') = nvl (:P_SUBMITTER, NVL(qfd.od_pb_auditor_name,'X')) and NVL(qfd.od_pb_qa_engr_email,'X') = nvl (:P_APPROVER, NVL(qfd.od_pb_qa_engr_email,'X')) order by 1

hh24:mi:ss'),trunc(a.creation_date)) and b.od_ob_ref_psid=a.od_ob_psi_id AND c.od_ob_ref_psid(+)=b.od_ob_ref_psid AND C.OD_OB_SKU(+) =B.OD_OB_SKU AND a.od_ob_psi_id=NVL(:p_psi_id,a.od_ob_psi_id) and nvl(:p_vendor_name, nvl(a.od_pb_vendor_name,'x')) and nvl(a.od_pb_factory_name,'x') = nvl(:p_factory_name, nvl(a.od_pb_factory_name,'x')) and nvl(a.od_pb_company,'x') = nvl (:p_service_provider, nvl(a.od_pb_company,'x')) and nvl(a.od_pb_attachment,'x') = nvl (:p_re_inspection, nvl(a.od_pb_attachment,'x')) and nvl(a.od_pb_odgso_qa_engineer,'x') = nvl(:p_submitter, nvl(a.od_pb_odgso_qa_engineer,'x')) and nvl(a.od_pb_odc_qa_engineer,'x') = nvl (:p_approver, nvl(a.od_pb_odc_qa_engineer,'x')) and nvl(a.od_pb_art_test_report_number,'x')=nvl(:p_inspection_report,nvl(a.od_pb_art_test_report_number,'x')) and nvl(a.od_pb_paid_by,'x') = nvl (:p_paid_by, nvl(a.od_pb_paid_by,'x')) and nvl(b.od_ob_sku , 1) = nvl(:p_sku , nvl(b.od_ob_sku , 1) ) and nvl(b.od_ob_dept_name,'x') = nvl (:p_department, nvl(b.od_ob_dept_name,'x')) and nvl(b.od_pb_division,'x') = nvl (:P_DIVISION, nvl(b.od_pb_division,'x')) and nvl(c.od_pb_failure_codes,'x')=nvl(:p_failure_type,nvl(c.od_pb_failure_codes,'x')) and nvl(c.od_pb_defect_code,'x') = nvl (:p_defects_code, nvl(c.od_pb_defect_code,'x')) and nvl(a.od_pb_inspection_result,'x') = nvl (:p_inspection_result,nvl(a.od_pb_inspection_result,'x')) order by a.od_ob_psi_id

select count(distinct a.od_ob_psi_id) "app_num8" from apps.q_od_ob_psi_defects_v c, apps.q_od_ob_psi_sku_v b, apps.q_od_ob_psi_v a where trunc(a.creation_date) between nvl(to_date(:p_date_from,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss'),trunc(a.creation_date)) and nvl( to_date(:p_date_to,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss'),trunc(a.creation_date)) and b.od_ob_ref_psid=a.od_ob_psi_id AND c.od_ob_ref_psid(+)=b.od_ob_ref_psid AND C.OD_OB_SKU(+) =B.OD_OB_SKU AND a.od_ob_psi_id=NVL(:p_psi_id,a.od_ob_psi_id) and nvl(a.od_sc_region,'x') = nvl(:p_region,nvl(a.od_sc_region,'x')) and nvl(a.od_sc_audit_agent,'x') = nvl(:p_source_agent, nvl(a.od_sc_audit_agent,'x')) and nvl(a.od_pb_vendor_name,'x') = nvl(:p_vendor_name, nvl(a.od_pb_vendor_name,'x')) and nvl(a.od_pb_factory_name,'x') = nvl(:p_factory_name, nvl(a.od_pb_factory_name,'x')) and nvl(a.od_pb_company,'x') = nvl (:p_service_provider, nvl(a.od_pb_company,'x')) and nvl(a.od_pb_attachment,'x') = nvl (:p_re_inspection, nvl(a.od_pb_attachment,'x')) and nvl(a.od_pb_odgso_qa_engineer,'x') = nvl(:p_submitter, nvl(a.od_pb_odgso_qa_engineer,'x')) and nvl(a.od_pb_odc_qa_engineer,'x') = nvl (:p_approver, nvl(a.od_pb_odc_qa_engineer,'x')) and nvl(a.od_pb_art_test_report_number,'x')=nvl(:p_inspection_report,nvl(a.od_pb_art_test_report_number,'x')) and nvl(a.od_pb_paid_by,'x') = nvl (:p_paid_by, nvl(a.od_pb_paid_by,'x')) and nvl(b.od_ob_sku , 1) = nvl(:p_sku , nvl(b.od_ob_sku , 1) ) and nvl(b.od_ob_dept_name,'x') = nvl (:p_department, nvl(b.od_ob_dept_name,'x')) and nvl(b.od_pb_division,'x') = nvl (:P_DIVISION, nvl(b.od_pb_division,'x')) and nvl(c.od_pb_failure_codes,'x')=nvl(:p_failure_type,nvl(c.od_pb_failure_codes,'x')) and nvl(c.od_pb_defect_code,'x') = nvl (:p_defects_code, nvl(c.od_pb_defect_code,'x')) and nvl(a.od_pb_inspection_result,'x') = nvl (:p_inspection_result,nvl(a.od_pb_inspection_result,'x')) and UPPER(a.od_pb_inspection_result)='PASS'
